long description: 10 Local Idea Minutes (Pack expiry at 23:59:59 hrs on activation day ) -- Mode of Recharge: Calling on ##4(Toll Free)
Local Mobile @30 p/m, (1st 2 min of day @ 2p/sec)
Local Mobile calls @30 p/min (1st 2 min of day @ 2p/sec)
Local Idea Calls @ 10p /min,1st 2 min of day @ 2p/sec
All Local and STD Mobile calls 30p/min

Unlimited Local/STD Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, local & national tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- Get 5% of MRP as Talktime on recharges through My Idea App & Idea Website. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
